ezvcard.io.html

Class HCardPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • ezvcard.io.html.HCardPage

  • public class HCardPage
extends Object

    Writes VCard objects to a templated HTML page (hCard format).

    Example: 

     VCard vcard1 = ...
 VCard vcard2 = ...
 
 HCardPage page = new HCardPage();
 page.add(vcard1);
 page.add(vcard2);
 
 File file = new File("hcard.html");
 page.write(file);
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt
    See Also:
    http://microformats.org/wiki/hcard
